message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $10,000.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only able to offer $9,500 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about $9,750?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering your offer, I am able to offer $9,600 for the product.
